title: Mørkøv and Cavendish Reunited: ‘The day after he crashed, my phone was ringing’
content:
A botched sprint in the final stage of the 2021 Tour de France put the wheels in motion for the Danish leadout ace to return for last chance at history.

Read the full article at Mørkøv and Cavendish Reunited: ‘The day after he crashed, my phone was ringing’ on Velo.
author: ahood
